roleset.name: cause to know

roles.note: This is a direct copy of the verb. 'Informed' will often be tagged as VBN. It should still be annotated as an adjective.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to inform.01. Inform.01 is a member of VN classes advise-37.9 and tell-37.2. Framed by Katie.

example.name: With args 0 and 1
example.text: This patient is well informed from her own research.

example.name: with arg 2
example.text: Patient is well informed as to the nature of the procedure
example.arg: as to the nature of the procedure
